title: Old style type font
content:
Hi everyone having real diffilculty locating this font... would redraw as vector but the quality is quite bad any help would be great think it will be a hand tooled font of somekind but been searching for a couple of days still no idea!!

please help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [star.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714060604/http:/typophile.com/files/star.jpg) | 18.29 KB |
author: jrpoole

comments.content:
It’s close to Atrax, is’nt it?

Bauersche Gießerei, Frankfurt am Main  
Erstguß 1926  
Heinrich Jost

There is a digital version — but it’s not as nice as the lead version.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714060604im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Atrax_marked_6379.jpg)

Digital version:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/atrax/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714060604/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/atrax/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/atrax/")

Georg  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
„Ich bin ein Preuße, kennt Ihr meine Farben...“
Thanks guys for the comments... looks like i have to buy myself this font!!
